aber.dcs.clg11.wordladder.model

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • aber.dcs.clg11.wordladder.model.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Data class used to represent each word read in from a dictionary file as a 'Node' element within the Graph data structure.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11)

    • Constructor Summary
